titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

div.p: ~~You must have union & communion in faith & love with all the Christians in the world. And refuse not local communion when you have a just call so far as they put you not on sinning. Let your usual meeting be with the purest church, if you lawfully may – and still respect the public good – but sometimes occasionally communicate with defective, faulty churches, so be it they are true Christians & put you not on sin: that so you may show that you own them as Christians, though you disown their corruptions.~~
Richard Baxter. 'The Great Question Resolved. What we must do to be Saved': London 1692.

body.p: The announcement is made today that Burge is the new Bishop of Southwark. This is a surprising, but may be a good appointment.
